column4: (She thinks your gagged mumbling is part of the game)
(She is has a headset on and is busy playing.)
(She peeks out from under her headset.) What's up?

column3: Do you need some help getting to a higher level?
column4: Nah, not right now. (She goes back to her game)

column3: Do you know what there is to do around here?
column4: (She smirks) Are you looking for some fun? Have you heard of the Devious Dungeon Challenge?
Don't bother me, then. (She goes back to her game)
It's a bet where you make ad revenue from streaming your game, but getting bound ingame means getting bound in real life as well!

column3: I don't like the look on your face.

column4: Righto! I'll get the recording equipment set up!
(She goes back to playing her game)

column3: I'd like to stop participating in the Devious Dungeon Challenge.
